comments.body:
We are moving away from sed magic and instead applying patches. For example: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b22786e7e9b7bdb6a56936ff29cc7e9968d7bc1d/tensorflow/lite/micro/tools/make/ext_libs/xtensa_download.sh#L74-L81

If you prefer, we can use a similar approach here as well. I only have a mild preference to keep things consistent but you are maintaining this code, so I'll let you decide if you want to change anything here.
Ok, I will keep it then. I like it for visibility on what's going on. I expect it to be relatively stable with few changes but if I am wrong we may switch to using patches.
